character.statement: If I want to win this game, I've got to find a way to fool the guesser.
No wonder it won't pop anything – the tip has been completely worn down!
Actually, I was hoping you could give me a cupful of fry oil.
I'm not thirsty right now.
I hit those balloons three different times, but they won't pop! What's wrong with this thing?
I hit those balloons three different times, but they won't pop!
Bubby was supposed to win me a teddy bear. I'm telling Mommy!
Thanks for getting me that sugar.
Want a soda?
Not my taste, but, hey, I believe in freedom! Eat what you want.
A cup of fry oil...
It's just like when the carnival came through when I was a boy. Hopefully without all the… unpleasantness that followed.
Be quiet, I'm eating!
Step right up and let me guess your weight. If I'm off by ten pounds or more, you'll win a prize beyond belief!
You, my friend, are 115 pounds!
Another perfect prognostication!
I don't believe it! I've never been wrong! Well, I'm a man of my word, so here's your prize.
You already won today!
He guessed my weight right.
This guy must be cheating. He's never wrong!
I have no idea why the balloons aren't popping.
Sorry, the teddy bears are just for display. Here, you can have this cup instead.
Sorry, one prize a day.
Pick the right duck and win a prize!
